Text: Please seed, doing 50kb/s now. Gonna seed for some days when im done.

Sorry for the mess above. I found a quick fix for the 64 bit that worked, I'm just gonna paste it.

If you're using 64bit system, then do this:

1. Open up your registry (start>run>regedit).

2. Copy the key from "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREMicrosoftWindows NTCurrentVersionProductId"

3. Create a new key (type: string)ďťż in "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREWow6432NodeMicrosoft Windows NTCurrentVersionProductId"

4. Paste in the value you copied from the last key. Now, run the unlocker it should work fine!
